docs.snippet: Thousands of Basque separatist sympathizers held a rally in northern Spain on Saturday celebrating the release from prison of a prominent regional leader four days after he completed a more than six-year sentence for trying to resurrect the banned...
docs.lead_paragraph: Thousands of Basque separatist sympathizers held a rally in northern Spain on Saturday celebrating the release from prison of a prominent regional leader four days after he completed a more than six-year sentence for trying to resurrect the banned political wing of armed group ETA.

headline.main: Spain: Pro-Independence Basque Leader Greeted by Thousands
headline.print_headline: Spain: Pro-Independence Basque Leader Greeted by Thousands
